lead_paragraph: Jimmy McMillan, the irreverent candidate for governor and aspiring musician from the Rent Is Too Damn High Party, can add another first to a bizarre list of accomplishments that include steampunk facial hair and dropping an album only days before the election: first candidate for governor to become an online pitchman.
snippet: New York Online: The candidate from the Rent Is Too Damn High Party has recorded a Web video ad for an auction site.

headline.main: The Rent Is High, but These Prices Are Low!

abstract: New York Online: The candidate from the Rent Is Too Damn High Party has recorded a Web video ad for an auction site.
